title: Charge Apple gear on the go with this beast of a power bank
description: The CukTech 30 Power Bank released this week sports massive battery capacity to keep all your Apple gear going anywhere. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: David Snow
excerpt: The CukTech 30 Power Bank released this week sports massive battery capacity to keep all your Apple gear going anywhere.
text: News With a 40,000mAh battery and 300 watts of total charging power, CukTech 30 dominates. Photo: CukTech For Apple users seeking a high-capacity portable power solution for all their gear, the new CukTech 30 Power Bank packs a massive 40,000mAh battery, combined charging power of up to 300 watts for up to five devices at once and some useful features, the company said Wednesday. CukTech 30 Power Bank Big battery CukTech 30 Power Bank This 40,000mAh power station can charge up to five devices at once with up to 300 watts of combined power, including 140W of fast charging for laptops. It's also a 144Wh outdoor generator and airline-approved as a flight carry-on. Pros:Massive 40,000mAh battery capacityFast charging for laptopsHandy handle for carryingCharges up to 5 devices at once Cons:May be be a bit awkward and heavy for some users to carry At the heart of the CukTech 30 is a massive 40,000mAh battery that can deliver up to seven full charges for an iPhone 15, the company said. That’s four times the capacity of a capable CukTech power bank I recently reviewed. More impressively, CukTech 30 packs enough power to completely charge a 16-inch MacBook Pro, making it a viable solution for pro users who need reliable power on the go. The power bank supports the latest charging protocols, including PD 3.1, ensuring compatibility with Apple’s entire device lineup. The unit’s large digital display gives real-time updates on battery status, input/output power and hub mode. Additionally, a low-current mode allows efficient charging for smaller devices such as Bluetooth headphones like AirPods Pro 2 and smart wearables like Apple Watch 10. Fast charging speeds and broad connectivity With its array of features, CukTech 30 Power Bank can charge all your Apple gear (and five items at once).Photo: CukTech In addition to the huge battery capacity, an interesting CukTech 30 feature is its 140-watt dual-way flash charging capability. It not only charges your devices quickly, it also allows the power bank itself to recharge in just 2.5 hours. For Apple users with multiple devices, the CukTech 30 offers comprehensive connectivity options to spread around up to 300W of charging power. They are: two USB-C ports, two USB-A ports and a 20W wireless charging pad. This means you can simultaneously charge your MacBook, iPad, iPhone, AirPods and Apple Watch without reaching for multiple adapters. Slick design, decent portability and smart features While many high-capacity power banks tend to be bulky, CukTech has managed to maintain a relatively portable form factor. The design includes a practical carrying handle, and despite its substantial capacity, the power bank complies with airline regulations, making it suitable for frequent travelers. The potent power bank’s relatively sleek aesthetic should appeal to Apple users accustomed to minimalist design. This shot gives you a good idea of the power bank’s size. It’s a dense cube, but it’s not too huge, despite its brawn.Photo: CukTech The power bank includes several intelligent features that complement the Apple ecosystem. A built-in USB hub functionality allows you to connect peripherals while charging, potentially reducing the number of dongles in your bag. The device also features a smart display that shows real-time information about battery status and power distribution. Safety and cooling To address the challenges of high-power charging, CukTech implemented a sophisticated cooling system with a PWM intelligent fan that adjusts automatically based on temperature. The power bank is built with EV-grade 21700 battery cells and includes multiple safety features, from short-circuit protection to a flame-retardant shell. For Apple users who frequently find themselves running low on power while working remotely or traveling, the CukTech 30 offers a comprehensive solution at $149.99. It’s available now on Amazon, positioning itself as a premium alternative to traditional portable chargers. For Apple users seeking a high-capacity portable power solution for all their gear, the new CukTech 30 Power Bank packs a massive 40,000mAh battery, combined charging power of up to 300 watts for up to five devices at once and some useful features, the company said Wednesday.

CukTech 30 Power Bank

Big battery

CukTech 30 Power Bank

This 40,000mAh power station can charge up to five devices at once with up to 300 watts of combined power, including 140W of fast charging for laptops. It's also a 144Wh outdoor generator and airline-approved as a flight carry-on.

Pros:

  • Massive 40,000mAh battery capacity
  • Fast charging for laptops
  • Handy handle for carrying
  • Charges up to 5 devices at once

Cons:

  • May be be a bit awkward and heavy for some users to carry

At the heart of the CukTech 30 is a massive 40,000mAh battery that can deliver up to seven full charges for an iPhone 15, the company said. That’s four times the capacity of a capable CukTech power bank I recently reviewed. More impressively, CukTech 30 packs enough power to completely charge a 16-inch MacBook Pro, making it a viable solution for pro users who need reliable power on the go. The power bank supports the latest charging protocols, including PD 3.1, ensuring compatibility with Apple’s entire device lineup.

The unit’s large digital display gives real-time updates on battery status, input/output power and hub mode. Additionally, a low-current mode allows efficient charging for smaller devices such as Bluetooth headphones like AirPods Pro 2 and smart wearables like Apple Watch 10.

Fast charging speeds and broad connectivity

In addition to the huge battery capacity, an interesting CukTech 30 feature is its 140-watt dual-way flash charging capability. It not only charges your devices quickly, it also allows the power bank itself to recharge in just 2.5 hours.

For Apple users with multiple devices, the CukTech 30 offers comprehensive connectivity options to spread around up to 300W of charging power. They are: two USB-C ports, two USB-A ports and a 20W wireless charging pad. This means you can simultaneously charge your MacBook, iPad, iPhone, AirPods and Apple Watch without reaching for multiple adapters.

Slick design, decent portability and smart features

While many high-capacity power banks tend to be bulky, CukTech has managed to maintain a relatively portable form factor. The design includes a practical carrying handle, and despite its substantial capacity, the power bank complies with airline regulations, making it suitable for frequent travelers. The potent power bank’s relatively sleek aesthetic should appeal to Apple users accustomed to minimalist design.

The power bank includes several intelligent features that complement the Apple ecosystem. A built-in USB hub functionality allows you to connect peripherals while charging, potentially reducing the number of dongles in your bag. The device also features a smart display that shows real-time information about battery status and power distribution.

Safety and cooling

To address the challenges of high-power charging, CukTech implemented a sophisticated cooling system with a PWM intelligent fan that adjusts automatically based on temperature. The power bank is built with EV-grade 21700 battery cells and includes multiple safety features, from short-circuit protection to a flame-retardant shell.

For Apple users who frequently find themselves running low on power while working remotely or traveling, the CukTech 30 offers a comprehensive solution at $149.99. It’s available now on Amazon, positioning itself as a premium alternative to traditional portable chargers.
